Package p4_group_8_repo

Class MyStage

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
p4_group_8_repo.World
p4_group_8_repo.MyStage
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class MyStage
extends World
A class that provides a pane for the background of the Game Scene. It extends the class World and has the function to handle background activities during the game play.
Author:
Liew Yih Seng
